comment.author: 93767754@N00
comment._content:
Picture from the upper part of Longyeardalen / Longyear Valley
The Snebrae=glacier  is named Longyearbreen (Longyear glacier).
Left side is the mountain Sarkofagen (also called Kistefjellet, sarkofag=kiste)
Right side of glacier is Nordenskiöldfjellet (1050m)
